gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIInterface

    public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIInterface
    Simple GUI handling all interaction with the user
    Author:
    Nelphindal

      • printMessage

                java.lang.String message,
                boolean toFront)
        Description copied from interface: GUIInterface
        Prints a message. It will block if toFront is true as long the user does not confirm the message.
        Specified by:

        toFront - user has have to confirm the message

      • setProgressSize

        public final void setProgressSize(int size,
                   java.lang.String action)
        Description copied from interface: GUIInterface
